Product is good like always and it is expected from Nokia.Battery last for 4 to 5 days easily.Sound is loud and clear.Clarity is good.The only two things which i don't like about this phone are :1. Only 1 preloaded wallpaper is available so u cant change the default wallpaper.2. Only 5 - 6  ringtones are available which are not good at all including the very basic Nokia Tune.
perfect item for this value...,
